description.value: The tax collector @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Strides}. At any point during this movement, they can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to hurl coins. If there are @Actor[WkAkyUiDPjq8HDz3]{Commoner} about, this typically causes a scene. Crowds are usually difficult terrain and have other effects (Core Rulebook 514).

This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.
description.label: Description

description.value: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
description.label: Description

description.value: This armor is simply a layer of heavy, quilted cloth, but it is sometimes used because its so inexpensive. Padded armor is easier to damage and destroy than other types of armor. Heavy armor comes with a padded armor undercoat included in its Price, though it loses the comfort trait when worn under heavy armor. You can wear just that padded armor or undercoat to sleep in, if your heavy armor is destroyed, or when otherwise not wearing the full heavy armor. This allows you to keep the armor invested and benefit from the power of any runes on the associated heavy armor, but no one else can wear your heavy armor without the padded undercoat.
description.label: Description

description.value: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
description.label: Description
